'''Just Me and You, the Sky So Blue, and Almost Getting Killed by a Cryo Regisvine''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Cryo Regisvine]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].
